targets.query: SELECT mean("death") FROM "autogen"."covid19" WHERE ("state" =~ /^$State$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(null)
SELECT last("positiveIncrease") / last("totalTestResultsIncrease")  FROM "covid19" WHERE ("state" =~ /^$State$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(previous)
SELECT last("positiveIncrease") FROM "covid19" WHERE ("state" =~ /^$State$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(previous)
SELECT last("totalTestResultsIncrease") FROM "covid19" WHERE ("state" =~ /^$State$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) , "state" fill(previous)
SELECT last("positiveIncrease") / last("totalTestResultsIncrease")   FROM "autogen"."covid19" WHERE ("state" =~ /^$State$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(null)
SELECT mean("hospitalizedCurrently") FROM "autogen"."covid19" WHERE ("state" =~ /^$State$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(null)
SELECT mean("hospitalizedCurrently") FROM "autogen"."covid19" WHERE ("state" =~ /^$State$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(null)
SELECT mean("hospitalizedCurrently") FROM "autogen"."covid19" WHERE ("state" =~ /^$State$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(null)

SELECT last("deathIncrease") as "Deaths (Inc)" ,last("hospitalizedIncrease") as "Hospitalized (Inc)"   ,last("hospitalizedCurrently") as "Hospitalized" ,last("inIcuCurrently") as "in ICU"  ,last("onVentilatorCurrently") as "on Ventilator"  FROM "autogen"."covid19" WHERE ("state" =~ /^$State$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) ORDER BY "time" DESC
